item.title: The blistering AMD stock rally just culminated in a milestone
item.description: Advanced Micro Devices shares have more than doubled this year, and the company joined the $400 billion market-cap club at Friday’s close.

item.title: Why Nov. 1 is a make-or-break day for millions of Americans’ finances
item.description: If the government shutdown stretches beyond October, experts warn that Nov. 1 could mark a grim cutoff for low- and middle-income families.

item.title: IBM’s stock has its best day since January, and quantum is a big reason why
item.description: A soon-to-be-published IBM paper discusses progress made in the realm of quantum error correction when using an AMD chip.

item.title: Social Security’s COLA will be 2.8% in 2026 — but prices are now rising faster than that
item.description: Social Security’s cost-of-living adjustment will be 2.8% in 2026, up from 2.5% this year, the Social Security Administration said on Friday.

item.title: ‘Big Brother is watching how we spend our dollars’: I asked to withdraw money from my bank. The teller started grilling me. Is this normal?
item.description: “We are going on a trip that could include casino visits, but I didn’t want her to know that.”
